Package peersim.kademlia.das.operations

Class RandomSamplingOperation

java.lang.Object
peersim.kademlia.operations.Operation
peersim.kademlia.operations.FindOperation
peersim.kademlia.das.operations.RandomSamplingOperation
public class RandomSamplingOperation extends FindOperation
This class represents a random sampling operation that collects samples from random nodes
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergi Rene
